name: Perception (itch)
description:
Perception is a text adventure game in which you are a cop in 'Merica. During the game you playthrough a supposedly regular work week, whereby you get to choose from a variety of dialog choices.

Content
  • Progression system showing the unlocks per day
  • 7 endings and 5 achievements
  • Various locations
  • Rebindable keys, no just kidding
Background

This project was sprung into existence, because I don't like text adventure games. My goal was to make one that isn't all liberal and 'deep', but one that is more humorous and has over the top stereotypes. So, realise that it's just for laughs. 

The music in the game was made by Marching Dream.

Total development time: 25 hours
